title: MeetRecorder - Google Meet Recorder Bot
description: Automated Google Meet recording by launching a Chrome instance with Selenium webdriver
Requests to join the meet and then start to record(video + audio) and saves the mp4 recording locally..

title: CodeSync - Collaborative Code Editor
description: A real-time collaborative code editor using WebSockets, enabling seamless multi-user peer coding.
Backend on Express.js for sessions & rooms. CodeMirror for syntax highlighting and theming.
